line.text: For shame deny that thou bear love to any
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Who for thy self art so unprovident
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Grant if thou wilt thou art beloved of many
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But that thou none lov is most evident
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For thou art so possessed with murdrous hate
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That gainst thy self thou stick not to conspire
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Seeking that beauteous roof to ruinate
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which to repair should be thy chief desire
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O change thy thought that I may change my mind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Shall hate be fairer lodged than gentle love
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Be as thy presence is gracious and kind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or to thy self at least kind-hearted prove
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Make thee another self for love of me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
